LABEL.NAME: First label
LABEL.CAPTION: First Label%0AVery Simple
LABEL.TOOLTIP: This example has a%0Avery simple display

LABEL.NAME: Second label
LABEL.CAPTION: Zoomed label (2nd label)
LABEL.COMMENT: This comment is somewhat long. Comments can hold a virtually unlimited number of characters (spaces included).
LABEL.TOOLTIP: This example is at 50% image zoom

LABEL.NAME: Third label
LABEL.CAPTION: Rollover label (3rd label)
LABEL.COMMENT: A vertical scrollbar automatically appears when a comment requires more lines than fit in the comment area - as is the case with this comment which is not verbose and yet is longer than will fit in the text area without a need to scroll to display the latter part of the comment.
LABEL.TOOLTIP: This label is revealed when the mouse rolls over it

LABEL.NAME: Fourth label
LABEL.CAPTION: This caption is overridden by the HTLM caption below
LABEL.COMMENT: Comments can contain carriage returns - new lines created with the Return key - like this... %0A or this %0A or this %0A ...very useful.

LABEL.NAME: Sixth label
LABEL.CAPTION: Polygon label (6th label)
LABEL.COMMENT: This is one final example comment.
